nodes.text: Sunsbringer was a corporal in the military forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. She was stationed at Echo Base and worked in the command center. She, alongside Toryn Farr, entered a betting pool about Han Solo and Leia Organa's relationship, and when Solo announced his intentions to leave, became distracted from her readouts and suggested somebody follow them to see what happened. During the Battle of Hoth, she received multiple injuries.
